title: Legacy Of Kain Blood Omen 2 PC-CompactedPortable
description:
Hi to all PC games fans and in particularly to the Legacy of Kain addicts ...


This file have the Legacy of Kain Blood Omen 2 game in a single executable
that can be used by (CCP) Compressed Compacted Portability method, or (CP) be extracted out completly ...

more information below ...


run CompressedCompactedPortableStarter and in 45 seconds
the game will start 

after playing and quitting game the saves will be at MyDocuments
folder in a Blood Omen 2 folder and the executable
is deleted




GETTING THE COMPACTED PORTABLE EXECUTABLE OUT OPTION

to get the portable executable to quick launch just run
the executable with the same name and wait about 45 seconds and
a compacted portable executable with 1.57 Gb will be available on the folder and
after that move the extracted executable to somewhere else on the computer
to let the compressed compacted portable do is work ...
NOTE : GET THE REG FROM THE BO2reg 4 CompactedPortableOut FOLDER AND READ THE READ ME.TXT

Happy game ...


LOK BloodOmen2 PC-CompactedPortable GlobeplusRippingWork GamingIsForEveryone


UPLOADER QUICK NOTE :

Hi Legacy of Kain games fans and it was a real pleasure work on this Compressed Compacted Portables for all the 5 games from the LOK series and i did my shot i think with sucess and now i hope all of you enjoy this games that i have to sday have a real addictive and enjoyable gameplay ... the only sad thing is about since Defiance no new Legacy of Kain games because i think this games series have all the great conditions to be a successfull series like Tomb Raider or Resident Evil or wherever great series because the games have great style in their own way and that is a mark on this game series, so generally looks with the potencial like any other great well known games series that we know about it ...
ok just a point of view, i think all of you can have your own point of view too and happy games to you all ... thank you .




* enjoy
